title: Isle of Reflections
team: Chaeeun Lee, Myeongseong Kim, and Hyunjung Kim
summary: An interactive lighting installation that can only be remotely explored via videotelephony.
Viewers visit the island filled with iridescent lights and colorful reflections through Zoom.

paragraph: An interactive lighting installation that can only be remotely explored via videotelephony.
Viewers visit the island filled with iridescent lights and colorful reflections through Zoom, a popular web-based video communication tool.
